channel.title: Portforwarding
channel.description:
Sorry if this is the wrong section but didn't see where else to put.
I'm trying to portforward and when I open up CMD I type ipconfig and it says ip config is not an internal or external command or something, and it used to work but not anymore.

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Wyrmcabbage, post:23, topic:388387”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=484210.msg3554615#msg3554615 date=1301788715]

I didn’t read rest of everyone’s replies, so let me give you this advice.

  1. You probably deleted ipconfig from System32

  2. [code]
    import java.util.;
    import java.lang.    ;
    import java.net.*;

public class GetOwnIP
{
public static void main(String args[]) {
try{
InetAddress ownIP=InetAddress.getLocalHost();
System.out.println("IP of my system is := "+ownIP.getHostAddress());
}catch (Exception e){
System.out.println(“Exception caught =”+e.getMessage());
}
}
}[/code]

Compile that and run

  1. http://www.google.com/ig/adde?moduleurl=www.labpixies.com/campaigns/ip/ip.xml&mkhp=1&source=ipha&utm_source=en-ha-na-us-sk&utm_medium=ha&utm_term=IP%20address

Or he just messed his environment variables up?
[/quote]
Oh…[/quote]
It’s solved.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“gravenfire23, post:17, topic:388387”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=484210.msg3553428#msg3553428 date=1301699746]

System32 Is the title of the admin cmd. It doesn’t show for some computers.

YOU SEEM TO BE UNABLE TO GRASP THE FACT THERE IS NO SUCH THING AS ADMIN CMD
[/quote]
So what dose the Run as admin do nothing i presume? (I am not saying this in a sarcastic way)[/quote]
C:\Users\Steven>chkdsk

Access Denied as you do not have sufficient privileges.
You have to invoke this utility running in elevated mode.

There, these commands for example require more privileges, not going to fucking System32.

C:\Users\Steven>cd C:\WINDOWS\System32

C:\Windows\System32>

Fuck tards.

Read full topic

Yup[/quote]
For one, there are certain things you cannot do without running it as admin, If I can re-find some I will gladly post, just atm i cba to think (brain fried after long work day)

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“Cool Kiid, post:8, topic:388387”]Kingman delete that fucking sig, It was a problem with my system32 run.bat I got a new pc. Btw, you don’t even know how to use cmd? It’s a little thing called “Run as administrator” The code that he gave you is a cmd admin code.

Edit - Btw nice work trying to make me look like a dumb ass? LAWL you haven’t even port forwarded. FAIL IS FAIL[/quote]
???
Also if you have something against another member you should probably take it out to an admin/moderator, not post it on a thread which is completely irrelevant to what you are saying.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

[quote=“Cool Kiid, post:8, topic:388387”]Kingman delete that fucking sig, It was a problem with my system32 run.bat I got a new pc. Btw, you don’t even know how to use cmd? It’s a little thing called “Run as administrator” The code that he gave you is a cmd admin code.

Edit - Btw nice work trying to make me look like a dumb ass? LAWL you haven’t even port forwarded. FAIL IS FAIL[/quote]
A problem with your System32 run.bat… Wut?

Oh, and you don’t need to run as administrator. So please, go away.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Cool Kiid, post:8, topic:388387”]Kingman delete that fucking sig, It was a problem with my system32 run.bat I got a new pc. Btw, you don’t even know how to use cmd? It’s a little thing called “Run as administrator” The code that he gave you is a cmd admin code.

Edit - Btw nice work trying to make me look like a dumb ass? LAWL you haven’t even port forwarded. FAIL IS FAIL[/quote]
I will not delete this sig, cool story bro, dumb ass you don’t have to run as administrator, no shit Sherlock Holmes, and I have portforwarded, my iPv4 address has changed and I couldn’t see what it was as ipconfig wasn’t working, and you obviously don’t know anything either.

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Cool_Kiid Cool Kiid
item.description:
@Cool_Kiid wrote:

Kingman delete that fucking sig, It was a problem with my system32 run.bat I got a new pc. Btw, you don’t even know how to use cmd? It’s a little thing called “Run as administrator” The code that he gave you is a cmd admin code.

Edit - Btw nice work trying to make me look like a dumb ass? LAWL you haven’t even port forwarded. FAIL IS FAIL

Read full topic

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

you just need to know you computers ip right? there are other places to get the ip. idk about ur router but mine give be a list of computers, their ip, and mac addresses. idk but i set up a static ip to the computer i need to port forward to otherwise if u get a new address then its forwarding somewhere else.

Read full topic
